alert.note: Alert for Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 03 at 9:25AM PDT until July 04 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL 11 AM PDT MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sustained west winds 20 to 30 mph, with gusts around 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Mojave Desert Slopes. * WHEN...Valid from 4 PM PDT this afternoon until 11 AM PDT Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Blowing dust will reduce visibilities in some locations. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 14, Highway 178 through and below Walker Pass, and Highway 58 through and below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
